meanings.definition: The act of removing or forcing out of a position or place.
meanings.sent1: The dislodgement of the rock caused a loud noise.
meanings.sent2: The dislodgement of the book from the shelf startled me.
meanings.sent3: The dislodgement of the cookie from the jar made the kids giggle.
meanings.sent4: The dislodgement of the old tree stump revealed a hidden treasure.
meanings.sent5: The dislodgement of the puzzle piece made it impossible to complete the picture.

meanings.definition: The state of being removed or forced out of a position or place.
meanings.sent1: After the dislodgement of the boulder, the path was clear.
meanings.sent2: The dislodgement of the snow from the roof was a relief.
meanings.sent3: The dislodgement of the cat from the box was a comical sight.
meanings.sent4: The dislodgement of the clouds revealed a bright blue sky.
meanings.sent5: The dislodgement of the key from the lock left us locked out.
